definition: to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor

sentences.english: Important than the survival of success.
Once upon a time, parents worried about their kids being out late at night getting into trouble.
sentences.chinese: 曾幾何時，家長總是擔心孩子們夜不歸宿惹麻煩。

sentences.english: You will eat the scraps that he gives you and you will live 30 years.
sentences.chinese: 你要喫他的殘羹剩飯，活上30年，這就是你的歸宿。

sentences.english: Maybe it's fate is never under water.
sentences.chinese: 也許它的歸宿是永沉水底。

sentences.english: People can be influenced, and that influencecan affect their destiny.
sentences.chinese: 人可以被影響，而這個影響會關係到他們的歸宿。

sentences.english: The school the starting point and end-result of all work is to the people's harmonious development.
sentences.chinese: 學校一切工作的出發點和歸宿就是爲了人的和諧發展。

sentences.english: Philosophical idea of "humanism" emphasize that a person is the beginning and the end of philosophy.
sentences.chinese: “人本主義”哲學觀強調人是哲學的出發點和歸宿點。

sentences.english: Maybe candy would be a good use for that nickel after all.
sentences.chinese: 也許糖果鋪會是這些鎳幣的一個好歸宿。

sentences.english: To seek end-result of mud, in the broomy boscage.
sentences.chinese: 在蔥鬱的叢林，找到泥土的歸宿。

sentences.english: Literature subjectivity theory is the total polarity of Liuzaifu's literary thought in 1980s.
sentences.chinese: 文學主體論是劉再復80年代文學思想的總體歸宿。

sentences.english: The core of humanistic spirit is the humanistic concern.
sentences.chinese: 數字圖書館人文精神的核心和歸宿點是人文關懷。

sentences.english: "It's the best place for him, " said Dumbledore firmly.
sentences.chinese: “這是他最好的歸宿，”鄧布利多堅決地說。“

sentences.english: In addition, we can obtain a sense of belonging.
sentences.chinese: 因爲有你，我便有了一種安全感和歸宿感。

sentences.english: National intersts is the basis of diplomatic policy.
sentences.chinese: 國家利益是外交政策制定的基石和歸宿。

sentences.english: While using , avoid this product and does not go home all night particularly.
sentences.chinese: 使用期間，尤忌本品夜不歸宿。
